• Battleships is a strategy game for two players 


• Players alternate turns in attempting to guess the position of the opposing player's ships 


• Once all ships have been sunk on a single grid, that player is declared the winner
To modify the size of the grid, enter the size below (min 5x5, max 30x30, default 10x10, rectangles also work):
To change the difficulty, enter a number between 1 and 10. 1 being easy, and 10 being the most difficult. Note that difficulty acts as a score multiplier!
